channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.36 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.36

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Footer handling improved
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.108.39 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.39

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fixed failure to expand the header
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/now: Migrate performance.timing
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: odata.v4.TableDelegate: Clear selection when updating the binding
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Prevent navigation when selecting a week

item.title: Version 1.108.37 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.37

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.108.38 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.38

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct state for the Selected property on the UploadSetItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add tooltip to the up and down arrow buttons

item.title: Version 1.120.24 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.24

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct state for the Selected property on the UploadSetItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: RTL flag is set on initialization
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: CommandExecution: Log error when command not found + make destroy fail-safe
    • Type: FIX, Description: Test Starter: Support ui5:// URLs for "page"
    • Type: FIX, Description: Test Starter: Support resource-roots configuration

item.title: Version 1.120.26 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.26

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: errors prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fixed failure to expand the header
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: User input not overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Appointments text is resized depending of the scale factor now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: inverted status is correctly displayed in ObjectListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: Added optional chaining
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: preserve value after rerendering of password field
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Selected item fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Removed maximum width of the MenuButton
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/now: Migrate performance.timing
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Prevent navigation when selecting a week
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.AnchorBar: Update ARIA role for anchor bar buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Calc FIX

item.title: Version 1.120.27 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.27

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicPage: blank space on snap is no longer visible
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Bar: Add role "toolbar" depending of the content
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/*: use string value for sap-cancel-on-close
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: Search field not cleared on reopen

item.title: Version 1.120.22 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.22

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the accessibility issue in aria-required-children within uploadCollection by changing the role 'option' to 'listitem'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust tooltip announcement
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.120.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.23

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.120.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.25

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: displayFormat is taken into account when formatting the output in 24-hour mode support
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"

item.title: Version 1.124.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.8

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Timing issue fixed

item.title: Version 1.124.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.9

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Legend selected is translated correctly in German

item.title: Version 1.127.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.2

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping

item.title: Version 1.127.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.3

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the no data description for cases where uploadEnabled is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the minimum height issue for the no data page in uploadSet control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of truncating characters in the GenericTile header section by removing the usage of sap.m.Text deprecated method
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'

item.title: Version 1.127.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.4

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.130.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Add fitType property for icons in Header and Object Card content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: New pagination experience
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Adjust Badge creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix focus lost on actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.CardBadgeCustomData: CardBadgeVisibilityMode is added to type descriptor
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Add new options
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: On touch devices navigation arrows are always visible
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Provide selection change event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Correct value restoration after backspace
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: sync customData between outer and internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTable deprecated control along with its files and folders from the repository, since it was introduced as an experimental control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: doesn't show scroll bar if not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: translations are now correclty applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider, sap.m.RangeSlider: Documentation update
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exact match with no autocomplete behavior corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct list item is selected when the setSelectedItemById API is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Upload button has a left margin same as other buttons in the table action row
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the filetypeMismatch event to send the correct filetype or mimetype
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: update documentation regarding wrapping behavior of the control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: invalidate details page before navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Display only compact indicator fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the UploadEnabled property setting enables or disables drag and drop that is attached from the plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add week announcement to grid cells
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: new CSS class for languages with higher line heights
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Prevent null within area resize observer deregistration
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of truncating characters in the GenericTile header section by removing the usage of sap.m.Text deprecated method
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Icon explorer scroll fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FESR: Enhance FESR to enable reporting of integration env
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/cldr/*.json: fix translations for sap-calendarWeek.narrow and .wide
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: CLDR data for currencies is considered correctly without currency customizing
    • Type: FIX, Description: dom/findTabbable: return when meet the scope element twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._AggregationCache: use undefined instead of null for dimensions or aggregates not present in a row
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fixed page freezing after deleting a variant
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Add support for calendarWeekNumbering
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: request method now supports FormData
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Add fitType property for icons in Header and Object Card content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Cards opened by ShowCard or paginator now have preset dimensions
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: New pagination experience
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Avoid horizontally overflowing content in ShowCard action dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.Splitter: Native pull-to-refresh is now not triggered when dragging splitter bar
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MDCTable: Enable Interactive Row Mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ActionToolbar: combine / split RTA
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field with ValueHelp: number of items not announced
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTable: arrow navigation on closed ValueHelp not working
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTable: announce no-data text if used a dropdown
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTable: ValueHelpDelegate.UpdateBinding not called in phone
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: use sap.ui.core.ILabelable interface
    • Type: FIX, Description: RangeOperator: runtime error if longText contains special characters
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CalendarInCard: Now allows 12 hour format of appointment time
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.ColorPicker: tooltip is displayed now for the current and new color box
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: Filtering of elements by the color property
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Timing issue fixed
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.ProgressIndicator#getEnabled] with no replacement.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.ProgressIndicator#setEnabled] with no replacement.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.integration.ActionDefinition#getButtonType] All <code>ActionDefinitions</code> are now rendered as menu items and don't have <code>buttonType</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.integration.ActionDefinition#setButtonType] All <code>ActionDefinitions</code> are now rendered as menu items and don't have <code>buttonType</code>.

item.title: Version 1.130.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon only link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust grid cell description
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: Do not apply currency customizing for decimals on currency formats, if format option "style: 'long'/'short'" is set
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics

item.title: Version 1.130.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.2

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: FESR: semanticStepName not set for interaction
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Incorrect scrolling prevented

item.title: Version 1.130.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.3

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed currentLocationText alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectHeader: IntroPress event now fired properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Fix failing QUnit
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Add detection for CSS preloads
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element|Popup: get DOMRef after calling parent "destroy"
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/LabelEnablement: handle destroy of label when updating inner control
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove additional role

item.title: Version 1.130.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.4

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Uploadset illustrated message properties are correctly updated when they are bound with a model

item.title: Version 1.130.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.5

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: The calendar week configuration has been properly applied
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: The calendar week configuration has been properly applied

item.title: Version 1.131.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.131.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Action on card level
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: visual alignments
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: no invalidation on landmarkInfo change
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Adjust Badge creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: pin button is fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: add preventable beforeClose event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Add custom option sample
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MaskInput: added 'submit' event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Dialog: beforeOpen/beforeClose events are now preventable
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.10 and v4.22
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Improve arrow up and down behavior
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Transparent IconTabFilters inline mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Popover: resizable property now covers all cases
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: QUnit test fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Remove icon aria-label attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Now marker is always displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Popover is correctly placed in the ComboBox
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Popover can now be opened by the keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the truncation of timestamp issue in the feedListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: prevent right click from firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Do not show empty Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: The sub-header is now taken into account when calculating the top padding
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Inline svg rendering issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FacetFilter: adjust dialog header announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MaskInput: 'Del' key now deletes more than one character
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon only link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: announce option's selected state
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FacetFilter: add content announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: added hours/minutes/seconds buttons tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox, sap.m.SuggestionsPopover: Adjust arrow down behavior with value state
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Fixed active toolbar focus jump
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the video source or the url setting uses the template strings correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Close popover on Escape key press before its initial focus is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Fix unstable qUnit test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FacetFilter: adjust loading facet list announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Uploadset illustrated message properties are correctly updated when they are bound with a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Supports Custom header with height bigger than one line
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust grid cell description
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust keyboard navigation via TAB
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Calling openBy on invisible popover no longer throws an error
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed focus after pressing the Reset button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: remove console error
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: update appointment styling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: Improve Accessibility Test Page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: Update ACC test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix failing test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fixed week days position in 320px
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantManagement clear deleted and renamed items before creating dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Prevent infinite resize
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix broken link in "Bulletin Board" Demo App
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Horizontal tab text is no longer cut off when extra text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed disabled Links tab order
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.ToolPage: update visual design for Horizon themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Selection now happens on Spacebar onkeyup event (not onkeydown)
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: remove border when used inside sap.tnt.ToolPage
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.10 and v4.22
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Popover: resizable property now covers all cases
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control.js: Consider Busy Section when moving focus to BusyIndicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control: Restore focus to the last focused DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control: restore focus before busy control is rerendered
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element.qunit.js: Introduce Timeout for FF
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: Do not apply currency customizing for decimals on currency formats, if format option "style: 'long'/'short'" is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/message/MessageMixin: fix additionalText calculation
    • Type: FIX, Description: LocalBusyIndicator: Set correct border radius in Horizon theme
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Update documentation for format option "precision"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/cldr/*.json: fix translations for sap-calendarWeek.narrow and .wide
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Correct filtering when both deprecated and experimental are checked
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Handle failed file fetches and display warning message
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Adjust Demo Apps & Resources aside card spacing
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Action on card level
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Corrected link for manifest parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Avoid horizontally overflowing content in ShowCard action dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.PaneContainer: fix invalidation of nested panes
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MDCTable: Add expand/collapse all for single nodes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FilterField: add new operators for DynamicDateRange
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTABLE: activate Home/End key navigation
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: add preventable beforeClose event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarMonthInterval: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified: Fix editing of DemoKit Samples
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.RecurrenceUtils: Correct positioning of non-work periods.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: prevent unnecessary focusin events
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.RecurrenceNonWorkingPeriod: nonWorkingPeriods shown correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: update appointment styling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FileUploader: improve DemoKit samples
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Incorrect scrolling prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix scrolling when switching tabs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: pin button is fixed

item.title: Version 1.131.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.131.1

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control: cleanup busy indicator in onBeforeRendering only when it's busy

item.title: Version 1.132.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.132.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Usage of relative links in WebPage cards is now enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.cards.BaseHeader: Press event is now fired when Spacebar key is released
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.AdaptiveCards: Visual test fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.AdaptiveCards: Visual test fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fixed failure to expand the header
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: state color in numeric header side indicator fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: card with paginator sets proper manifest url to child card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: fix focus styles of Card in GridContainer
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: fixed numeric header gap between icon and numeric indicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Internal demo no longer throws exception
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: resolved boolean values are now correct
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Button: Adding a new style for the badge
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: add preventable beforeClose event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Introducing 'src' property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: update visual design for Horizon themes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: Enhance keyboard navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the preview load while back navigating to the file in preview dialog's carousel
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: prevent adding tokens to disabled input
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Accessible name is now provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Screen reader announcements now adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Documentation is now updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Fix misaligned SearchField
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed currentLocationText alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Prevent losing focus on nMore popover close
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: provide accessibility info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: apply tooltip properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Visual test fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: render tokens based on their order
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: move focus into Popup before opening animation starts
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: prevent unnecessary firing of appointmentSelect event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/m/Input: Respect the busy indicator as part of the input
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now disable the video preview once the Preview dialog is closed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Bar: adjust aria-labelledby attribute rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of image not rendering in the numeric content control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: displayFormat is taken into account when formatting the output in 24-hour mode support
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Switch: remove duplicated state announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: UploadsetwithTable plugin will now handles offline upload request error handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: adjust inner list announcements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Connection between sap.m.MenuItem and sap.ui.unified.MenuItem is handled correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Improve accessibility sample
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Improved arrow navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: first week of year is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/m/demokit/tutorial/walkthrough: Replace test links with testsuite
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/m/demokit/tutorial/walkthrough: Correct links for the testsuite
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: remove redundant announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Text truncation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TableSelectDialog: fixed documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Removing the note in the documentation for endContent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Last X included options are translatable now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: add accessible name for the popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Console error prevented
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: update visual design for Horizon themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: correct colors for Fiori 3 themes
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.base.Object.isObjectA(): type inference for TypeScript
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element|Popup: get DOMRef after calling parent "destroy"
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/LabelEnablement: handle destroy of label when updating inner control
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: move focus into Popup before opening animation starts
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/demokit/sample/OpaTestLibrary: Fix race condition in OPA
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control: cleanup busy indicator in onBeforeRendering only when it's busy
    • Type: FIX, Description: FESR: semanticStepName not set for interaction
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: CommandExecution: Log error when command not found + make destroy fail-safe
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit#setFormatOptions: Introduce defaulting of decimals to 3 for unit types
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control.js: Consider Busy Section when moving focus to BusyIndicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control: Restore focus to the last focused DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Control: restore focus before busy control is rerendered
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl - Fix long fileName in case of inline appdescriptor change
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Usage of relative links in WebPage cards is now enabled
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: ComboBox filter support for groups
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Actions toolbar now sets the 'card' association
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: card with paginator sets proper manifest url to child card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: fixed numeric header gap between icon and numeric indicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: resolved boolean values are now correct
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.PaneContainer: fix invalidation of nested panes
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FilterField: Empty, NotEmpty for Date and DateTime
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: move focus into Popup before opening animation starts
    • Type: FIX, Description: CreationRow: Only call setHideEmptyRows if row mode offers it
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: do not open ValueHelp if Token focused
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit#setFormatOptions: Introduce defaulting of decimals to 3 for unit types
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: Enhance keyboard navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Accessible name is now provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Screen reader announcements now adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust accessibility semantics
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: fix qunit tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Prevent navigation when selecting a week
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: YearPicker content now fits in limited size
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust non working days display
  • Library: sap.ui.ux3
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: move focus into Popup before opening animation starts
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Calc FIX
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Focus loss prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Revert " Calc FIX"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove additional role
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Calc FIX
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Incorrect scrolling prevented
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.table.columnmenu.Item#undefined] the concept has been discarded.

item.title: Version 1.133.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Added option for overflowing with a "Show More" button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Prevent error when FCL is not rendered
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: errors prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.CardHeader: Status text is not overflowing
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card dialog can now open a Component Card
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix overlapping of busy indicator
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Option to get the first and last visible days is now provided
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.11 and v4.23
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Shift+click selection of date ranges in Month view
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Link: Reactive area size API introduced
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.YearRangePicker: Selected year ranges now show as selected
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SegmentedButton: Introduce new parameters
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ColumnMenu: Update to latest design spec
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Invisible tokens related exceptions are now prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: n-more popover is now not created on initial rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Remove the 100% width
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: focus state is displayed with proper text color now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: The support for 2400 is disabled if there is no appropriate displayFormat
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the redundant aria-labelledby property for the avatar of FeedListItem control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: ACC automation tests improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectHeader: is correctly displayed on large screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Appointments text is resized depending of the scale factor now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: wraps correctly when is active
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Box shadow is now fully visible when the popover is placed at the edge of the screen
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Aligned with visual specification
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: preserve value after rerendering of password field
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PullToRefresh: Stabilized tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MasterPage: Stabilized tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: Added optional chaining
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Popover visibility is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Plugin will now set valid vds media type for the vds file uploads
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: User input not overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the preview load while back navigating to the file in preview dialog's carousel
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageBox: Corrected header shadow color parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Selected item fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageStrip: Close button information shouldn't be read out
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DraftIndicator: Fix cutting of text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Decorative avatar acc behaviour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectHeader: IntroPress event now fired properly
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Item design property and single click area are now added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: The existing design is now updated according to the applicable standards
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: external link has corect styling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: "selected" no longer announced on every focused item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.NavigationList: error is not trown in console
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.11 and v4.23
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Upgrade to CLDR version 46.1.0
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ManagedObjectBindingSupport: support setting type with Class
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/UpdateMethod: Align spelling of key and value
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Fix failing QUnit
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.MockServer.RequestHandler#response: Fix wrong return value of 'response' method
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Add detection for CSS preloads
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat: fix spacing in short currency format
    • Type: FIX, Description: MessageMixin: fix wrong additionalText
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Sequence of tracked events corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Add missing callback
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Replace deprecated API
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Tracked site name corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Improve error handling in UsageTracking.qunit
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Added option for overflowing with a "Show More" button
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ColumnMenu: Update to latest design spec
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card dialog can now open a Component Card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Pagination dialog min-height increased
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ColumnMenu: Update to latest design spec
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterConverter: Empty-Operator filters for null instead for ""
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField, MultiValueField: click on CheckBox in value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: MTable: item count wrong if $count used
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: wrong level for table header
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ColumnMenu: Update to latest design spec
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.YearRangePicker: Selected year ranges now show as selected
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SegmentedButton: Introduce new parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: Clear files functionality adjusted
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix overlapping of busy indicator
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.LocaleData#getCurrencyFormat] use {@link #getCompactCurrencyPattern} instead
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.LocaleData#getDecimalFormat] use {@link #getCompactDecimalPattern} instead

item.title: Version 1.38.63 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.38.63

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Prepare for upcoming 'unload' event deprecation and deprecate APIs 'onWindowBeforeUnload', 'onWindowUnload' and 'onWindowError' in 'sap/ui/core/Component'

item.title: Version 1.71.68 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.68

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Qunit in IE fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessagePage: Icon ignored from screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add tooltip to the up and down arrow buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: ARIA roles are now correct
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types

item.title: Version 1.71.69 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.69

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.PaneContainer: fix invalidation of nested panes

item.title: Version 1.71.70 Changes
item.description:

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: User input not overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Test page loads correctly
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/now: Migrate performance.timing

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: align current week calculations

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Prevent closing of Popover after lazy loading content
